rooms.name: entrance_hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with Scandinavian minimalistic decor, natural materials.

rooms.name: living_room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light and views of the courtyard.

rooms.name: dining_room
rooms.description: Adjacent to kitchen, designed for gatherings and enhanced ventilation.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Modern Scandinavian kitchen with efficient layout and integrated storage. Natural light from large windows ensures a bright space.

rooms.name: guest_room_1
rooms.description: Guest room ensuring privacy and comfort; includes en-suite bathroom (shared with adjacent master suite).

rooms.name: master_suite_ground
rooms.description: Ground-level portion of the master suite to ensure accessibility, with ensuite facilities.

openings.description: Double garage door opening for two-car parking.
Large windows facilitating natural light and ventilation; aligned with Vastu's east-west axis for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: master_suite_upper
rooms.description: Primary master suite on the upper floor with expansive windows ensuring natural light and ventilation, private terrace access.

rooms.name: bedroom_2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom offering privacy and ample natural lighting through strategic openings.

rooms.name: bedroom_3
rooms.description: Third bedroom designed for individual use, following Scandinavian design principles with clean lines.

openings.description: Staircase connecting ground floor to upper floor, designed with a minimalistic approach.
Balcony opening that leads to the rooftop terrace, enhancing natural ventilation.

rooms.name: rooftop_terrace
rooms.description: Luxurious open terrace designed for relaxation and social gatherings, incorporating natural elements and greenery.

rooms.name: central_courtyard
rooms.description: Central open courtyard promoting natural light and ventilation throughout the villa; designed per Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
